snippet.title: Blood of Heroes | Character Gameplay Video - Ratkha
snippet.description:
He’s Ratkha, Skin of Stone, ironclad, slow, and deadly. Apply for Blood of Heroes closed beta, and get a chance to take him to the battlefields as soon as May 4: https://bloodofheroes.online/

Become him if you want to last here: he dons the strongest armor; he bears the toughest shield; in the utmost peril, his skin hardens into stone. Stay close to him if you want to win: he’ll soak in the damage and leave your opponents exhausted, he’ll stun them, and then will let you deliver the fatal blow.

Blood of Heroes is a fierce PVP melee action multiplayer game set in a dark fantasy world. Going into closed beta on May 4th, 2021.

Let’s fight and have fun together:

Like us on Facebook: 
https://www.facebook.com/bloodofheroesgame 
Join us on VK: 
https://vk.com/bloodofheroes
Follow us on Twitter:
[EN] https://twitter.com/BloodofHeroesEN
[RU] https://twitter.com/BloodofHeroesRU

#BloodOfHeroes #BoH_cbt #BoH_gameplay
